solution_line_template: Let’s first calculate what the apple trees produce: {num_apple_trees} trees * {apple_kg_per_tree} kg/tree = <<{num_apple_trees}*{apple_kg_per_tree}={apple_total_kg}>>{apple_total_kg} kg
Then let's calculate what the peaches produce: {num_peach_trees} trees * {peach_kg_per_tree} kg/tree = <<{num_peach_trees}*{peach_kg_per_tree}={peach_total_kg}>>{peach_total_kg} kg
We add these two masses: {apple_total_kg} kg + {peach_total_kg} kg = <<{apple_total_kg}+{peach_total_kg}={total_kg}>>{total_kg} kg
